content: I am currently a Master’s student in Computer Science department at UMass. My research interest is in computer vision, especially, object recognition in self and weakly supervised manner. My current research focuses on latent variable and generative models to better understand weak supervision cases.
summary: I am currently a Master’s student in Computer Science department at UMass. My research interest is in computer vision, especially, object recognition in self and weakly supervised manner. My current research focuses on latent variable and generative models to better understand weak supervision cases.
title: Wonho Bae

summary: Improved detecting small objects by super-resolving small objects using large objects as supervision
title: Better to Follow, Follow to Be Better: Towards Precise Supervision of Feature Super-Resolution for Small Object Detection
